author: psmith
msg: Initial description html file for UDP receiver, more of a template.

author: psmith
msg: Rather than a resource bundle of plain text, it makes more sense
to use HTML, which looks nicer.

author: psmith
msg: Changes because WelcomePanel is now a singleton.
Fix for a JDK 1.4 specific method that was being used.
Also added a convenience method to show a Help url, that
ensures the Welcome Panel is made visible and the URl set for display.

author: psmith
msg: Moved out the stylesheet definition to it's own file so that other
HTML files within Chainsaw can share it.
